ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish like to swim in me. What am I?
I am small and live in a shell. I crawl on the sand. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I have a hard home on my back.
⛱️ I like to be on the beach.

ocean.question: I have many arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have more than two arms.

ocean.question: I am a very big animal that lives in the ocean. I say 'blub, blub'. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm one of the biggest animals in the world.
🌬️ I breathe air through a hole on my head.
🎶 People like to watch me jump.

ocean.question: I am a big sea animal, but I am not a fish. I have a hard shell and swim slowly.

hints.text: 🐢 I carry my home on my back.
⏳ I can live for a very long time.

ocean.question: I swim very fast and have sharp teeth! People are scared of me.

hints.text: 🦷 I have lots of pointy teeth.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am often bright and colorful.
🏡 I live in a coral reef.

ocean.question: I live at the bottom of the ocean and hide in a shell that I didn't make.

hints.text: 🐚 I don't have my own shell.
🚶‍♂️ I borrow a shell from another animal.
🦀 Some people think I'm related to crabs.

ocean.question: I am squishy and swim in the ocean. If you touch me, it might sting!

hints.text: 🚫 Some types of me can be dangerous.

ocean.question: I am long and slithery, and I live in the ocean. Some people think I look like a snake. Who am I?

hints.text: 🪨 I like to hide in rocks.

cosmos.question: I am big and yellow and shine in the day! What am I?

hints.text: 👀 You can't look right at me.

cosmos.question: I come out at night and am round and white. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 Sometimes I look like a cookie with a bite taken out!

cosmos.question: I twinkle in the night sky. I am very far away. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I look like a little light.

cosmos.question: I am the place where the sun, moon and stars live. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 You can fly through me in a rocket!

cosmos.question: Our home is this big round ball! What is it?

hints.text: 🌍 You are standing on me right now!

cosmos.question: I'm a big group of stars that makes a picture! What am I?

hints.text: 🔍 You need a telescope to see me well

cosmos.question: I go around and around the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I don't have my own light!

cosmos.question: I'm a very big group of stars, gas, and dust. Many stars live inside me! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ There are many of me in the Universe!
🌀 We live in the Milky Way example of this.

cosmos.question: I am red and rocky and the next planet from Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People might visit me one day.
👽 Some people think aliens might live here.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas, the biggest planet. I have a very famous spot! What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I am made of gas, not rock!
🔴 I have a big red spot.
